code: import React,{useState}from'react';import BsNav from'../Containers/BsNav';import axios from'axios';import'../styles/InstrumentSelector.css';import guitarPng from'../img/guitarPng.png';import drumsPng from'../img/drumsPng.png';import violinPng from'../img/violinPng.png';import pianoPng from'../img/pianoPng.png';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const InstrumentSelector=()=>{const[activeInstrument,setActiveInstrument]=useState('Piano');const apiUrl=process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL;const instruments={Piano:pianoPng,Guitar:guitarPng,Violin:violinPng,Drums:drumsPng};const switchInstrument=async function(instrumentName){let dictionary=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:'topic_to_audio';console.log("Switching instrument to: ".concat(instrumentName));try{const response=await axios.post("".concat(apiUrl,"/switch_dictionary"),{dictionary});setActiveInstrument(instrumentName);console.log("Switched to ".concat(instrumentName),response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error switching instrument:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"MainPage-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BsNav,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"instrument-selector-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Current Instrument: ",activeInstrument]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:instruments[activeInstrument],alt:activeInstrument,className:"instrument-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"button-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>switchInstrument('Piano','piano_dictionary'),children:"Piano"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>switchInstrument('Guitar','guitar_dictionary'),children:"Guitar"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>switchInstrument('Violin','violin_dictionary'),children:"Violin"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>switchInstrument('Drums','drums_dictionary'),children:"Drums"})]})]})]});};export default InstrumentSelector;
